Key Match Events: The game went into double overtime with the Kings winning 123-118.
DeRozan scored nine of Sacramento's 11 points in the second overtime.
Jaime Jaquez Jr. had a triple-double with 16 points, 12 rebounds, and 10 assists for Miami.
Post-Match Reflections: Sacramento is playing with more heart and effort under interim coach Doug Christie.
The Heat struggled without Jimmy Butler and are 4-7 this season without him.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was tied at 102 at regulation and 112 after the first overtime.
The Heat are 4-7 without Jimmy Butler this season.
The Kings extended their winning streak to a season-high five games under Christie.
